name: Paris OG
description: Paris OG is an indica-dominant strain with calming effects that promote rest and relaxation. Rumor has it that Paris OG descends from Headband and Lemon OG, who together pass on a sweet blend of fruity, citrus flavors. With victories in multiple competitions including 1st place in the 2014 Michigan High Times' Cannabis Cup, Paris OG has undoubtedly secured itself a long-lasting reputation in the cannabis world.
descriptionPlain: Paris OG is an indica-dominant strain with calming effects that promote rest and relaxation. Rumor has it that Paris OG descends from Headband and Lemon OG, who together pass on a sweet blend of fruity, citrus flavors. With victories in multiple competitions including 1st place in the 2014 Michigan High Times' Cannabis Cup, Paris OG has undoubtedly secured itself a long-lasting reputation in the cannabis world.

highlightedReviews.text: Oh wow, this one’s ridiculously good. A medium to slow come on that gradually grows in pleasure - like an orgasm in extreme slow motion. You may think that’s hyperbolic, but the whole body literally radiates with pleasure. This degree of physical feel good-ness, euphoria, and sensory accentuation -all coupled with an impressive ”goneness” catapult this high into the hallucinogenic echelons of LSD. Initial rush of come on does temper out into a calmer, more chilled stone. But goddamn, music is all-encompassing. Visuals are rich and powerful, narrow focus seems to narrow depth of field, making the dimensionality of things very striking. Despite strong, intoxicating effects the mental space stays calm, collected. Noticeably slowed/disabled, but happy and surprisingly competent at conveying thoughts. Provides perfect, cozy zone out times...ideal for time passage. Think I’m going to have to give this one a perfect score.
Body high like very few I’ve ever experienced. Calming effect on the mind, but not numbing by any means. Definitely good for finding yourself deep in thought.

articles.title: The 2014 Michigan Medical Cannabis Cup Winners
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Another exciting weekend of competitive cannabis took place this past weekend in Clio, Michigan! In case you missed the High Times Medical Cannabis Cup in the Mitten State, here are the champion strains and products that blew away the judges. (Also, did you score a strain t-shirt from Leafly's booth at the Cup? Remember to send us a picture on Facebook, Instagram, or Twitter!)
 
 Best Indica Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Paris OG from Oasis Medical Seeds
2nd Place: Alien Dawg F2 from Herbal Solutions
3rd Place: Grape OX from Herban Legendz, LLC
 
 Best Sativa Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Catfish from Arborside Compassion
2nd Place: Ghost Train Haze #1 from Organibliss
3rd Place: MelonGum from We Grow Education and Collective Centers
 
 Best Hybrid Cannabis Strains
1st Place: GG (f.k.a Gorilla Glue) from Herbal Solutions
2nd Place: Death Star from Pure West Compassion Club
3rd Place: Veganic Candyland from Kushman Veganics for Buds & Roses
 
Best Cannabis Concentrates
1st Place: Raskal's Lemon from Mr. B's Extracts
2nd Place: Kosher Kush Dewaxed from 710 Savant
3rd Place: Candy Jack Shatter from Oasis Medical / Vader Extracts / Dab Vader
 
Non-Solvent Hash
1st Place: Jedi Kush Ice Wax from NLG
2nd Place: HeadCandy Kush Hash from Compassion
3rd Place: Northern Hash Plant Hash from New World Seeds Resource Center
 
Best High CBD Cannabis Products
Flowers: Cannatonic from Detroit Nutrient Company / IDK Farms
Concentrates: Concentrated Hemp Oil "CBD" from CANNA Vest / Care of Michigan Hemp Company
Edibles: Flower of Life Extract CBD Pills w/ Vernon Phillips from MTG
photo credit (resized): w4nd3rl0st (InspiredinDesMoines) via photopin cc

articles.title: The 2014 San Francisco Cannabis Cup Winners
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Over the weekend, cannabis enthusiasts flocked to the beautiful Bay Area of California to celebrate yet another High Times Cannabis Cup. Leafly was there (attendees, you scored a Leafly tank, right?) to witness the history unfold, and we return with news of your 2014 champions. Congratulations to all of the winners and to those who placed in their category!
 
 Best Sativa Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Cracker Jack – Santa Cruz Mountain Naturals
2nd Place: Silver Haze – MedMar Healing Center
3rd Place: Tangerine Haze – Heirloom Genetics
 
 Best Indica Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Chem Scout – IC Collective
2nd Place: Paris OG – California Naturals
3rd Place: XXX OG Kush – Life Is Good Healing
 
 Best Hybrid Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Thin Mint Cookies – Gold Coast Collection
2nd Place: Kush Company OG Kush – Wellness Earth Energy Dispensary – W.E.E.D Studio City
3rd Place: Deathstar – San Jose Patients Group
 
 Best Cannabis Concentrates
1st Place: Hell Raiser OG – TLC Collective / Gold Coast Extracts
2nd Place: XJ-13 Lemonhead – Alternative Herbal Health Services / Prime Extractions
3rd Place: J-1 – Nectar’s
 
Best Cannabis Edibles
1st Place: Artisanal Cannabis Macarons – Madame Munchie
2nd Place: Hazelnug & Grub – Organicares Collective
3rd Place: Jambo – Jambo Direct
 
Best Non-Solvent Hash
1st Place: Kottonmouth Kush x Strawberry Cough Ice Water Hash – Medibrothers
2nd Place: HGH Extractions Goji OG Solventless – Delta Health Center
3rd Place: BAMF Private Reserve Cookies – BAMF Extractions
 
Best High-CBD Cannabis Products
Flowers: Great White – Alpha Medic
Edibles: Medibrothers and MTG Medi-Chew High CBD – Medibrothers & MTG Seeds
Concentrates: Charlotte's Web – P.E.A.C.E. Plant Essentials And Cannabis Extracts
Photo credit: Thomas Hawk via Photopin CC
